projects.name: First Featured Project
projects.descripton: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

projects.name: Second Featured Project
projects.descripton: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

projects.name: Third Featured Project
projects.descripton: Get busy living or get busy dying.

projects.name: Fourth Featured Project
projects.descripton: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.

projects.name: Fifth Featured Project
projects.descripton: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.

projects.name: Sixth Featured Project
projects.descripton: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

projects.name: DashBoard Featured Project
projects.descripton: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
